public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView loadUserPage(@ModelAttribute(value="userClass")

        Load the user page
        Parameters:
        u - User object for user viewing the page
        usr - optional String of what user's page to view

public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView redirectNote(@ModelAttribute(value="userClass")

                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String selectedId)
        Redirect from the user page to a note
        Parameters:
        u - User object for user who requested this page
        selectedId - String database id of the note requested
